content: The company recorded revenues of $4.2 million for the three months ended September 30, 2022, as compared to $2.6 million for the three months ended September 30, 2021. Salaries and wages expense totaled $2.1 million for the three months ended September 30, 2022, and compared to $1.2 million for the three months ended September 30, 2021. General and administrative expenses totaled $1.3 million for the quarter ended September 30, 2022 compared to $755,000 for the year ago quarter. Marketing and advertising expense totaled $726,000 for the three months ended September 30, 2022, compared to $65,000 for the three months ended June 30, 2021. The company reported $7.6 million of other income for the three months ended September 30, 2022, compared to $120,000 other expense for the three months ended September 30, 2021. Net income for the three months ended September 30, 2022, totaled $6.1 million or $0.35 per share compared to a loss of $595,000 or $0.05 per share.
